options.content:
# Variable Update Test Dashboard

Click cells below to update variables without page reload.

**Current Values:** Region=`${region}` | Environment=`${environment}` | Service=`${service}`

options.svg: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><!DOCTYPE svg PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD SVG 1.1//EN" "http://www.w3.org/Graphics/SVG/1.1/DTD/svg11.dtd"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" version="1.1" width="800" height="600" viewBox="0 0 800 600"><defs/><g><text x="400" y="20" fill="#424242" font-family="Helvetica" font-size="14" text-anchor="middle" font-weight="bold">Variable Update Test - Click cells below</text><g data-cell-id="region-us-west"><g id="cell-region-us-west" data-label="US West"><rect x="20" y="40" width="150" height="60" fill="#e3f2fd" stroke="#1976d2" stroke-width="2" pointer-events="all"/><text x="95" y="75" fill="#1976d2" font-size="14" text-anchor="middle" font-weight="bold">US West</text></g></g><g data-cell-id="region-us-east"><g id="cell-region-us-east" data-label="US East"><rect x="190" y="40" width="150" height="60" fill="#e3f2fd" stroke="#1976d2" stroke-width="2" pointer-events="all"/><text x="265" y="75" fill="#1976d2" font-size="14" text-anchor="middle" font-weight="bold">US East</text></g></g><g data-cell-id="region-eu"><g id="cell-region-eu" data-label="Europe"><rect x="360" y="40" width="150" height="60" fill="#e3f2fd" stroke="#1976d2" stroke-width="2" pointer-events="all"/><text x="435" y="75" fill="#1976d2" font-size="14" text-anchor="middle" font-weight="bold">Europe</text></g></g><g data-cell-id="env-production"><g id="cell-env-production" data-label="Production"><rect x="20" y="120" width="150" height="60" fill="#ffebee" stroke="#c62828" stroke-width="2" pointer-events="all"/><text x="95" y="155" fill="#c62828" font-size="14" text-anchor="middle" font-weight="bold">Production</text></g></g><g data-cell-id="env-staging"><g id="cell-env-staging" data-label="Staging"><rect x="190" y="120" width="150" height="60" fill="#fff3e0" stroke="#ef6c00" stroke-width="2" pointer-events="all"/><text x="265" y="155" fill="#ef6c00" font-size="14" text-anchor="middle" font-weight="bold">Staging</text></g></g><g data-cell-id="env-dev"><g id="cell-env-dev" data-label="Development"><rect x="360" y="120" width="150" height="60" fill="#e8f5e9" stroke="#2e7d32" stroke-width="2" pointer-events="all"/><text x="435" y="155" fill="#2e7d32" font-size="14" text-anchor="middle" font-weight="bold">Development</text></g></g><g data-cell-id="reset-all"><g id="cell-reset-all" data-label="Reset All"><rect x="520" y="40" width="230" height="140" fill="#fafafa" stroke="#616161" stroke-width="2" pointer-events="all"/><text x="635" y="105" fill="#616161" font-size="16" text-anchor="middle" font-weight="bold">Reset All</text><text x="635" y="125" fill="#616161" font-size="11" text-anchor="middle">Clear all variables</text></g></g></g></svg>
options.panelConfig:
---
cellIdPreamble: "cell-"

linkVariables:
  defaultRegion: "us-west-2"
  defaultEnv: "development"

cells:
  region-us-west:
    setVariables:
      region: "us-west-2"

  region-us-east:
    setVariables:
      region: "us-east-1"

  region-eu:
    setVariables:
      region: "eu-central-1"

  env-production:
    setVariables:
      environment: "production"

  env-staging:
    setVariables:
      environment: "staging"

  env-dev:
    setVariables:
      environment: "development"

  reset-all:
    setVariables:
      region: "${defaultRegion}"
      environment: "${defaultEnv}"
      service: "none"
